title: CyberLink AudioDirector Ultra 4.0.4116 (patch REiS) [ChingLiu]
description:
Powerful and intuitive audio editing, mixing, restoration and mastering for your videos

Great audio is half of the movie experience, and improving the audio in video projects can dramatically enhance the final result. AudioDirector demystifies the audio editing process by adding intuitive audio enhancement tools that make videos better.

Powerful editing and mixing tools combine with state-of-the-art restoration technologies and round-trip interoperability with PowerDirector to dramatically enrich the audio experience, cut down on video editing time and bring enjoyment to the creative process.

Create Better Videos with Professional-Level Audio

Round-trip Editing with PowerDirector - AudioDirector is the foremost solution for editing and fixing audio soundtracks in videos. Designed to work flawlessly with award-winning video editor, PowerDirector, seamless integration enables round-trip editing, which enhances the audio/video editing workflow and reduces total project editing time.

Direct Soundtrack Editing - Directly edit audio tracks embedded in videos with support for up to 7.1 multichannel sound. Any video that is supported for import can also be exported in the same audio configuration.

Synchronize Audio and Effects - Synchronize voice-overs or audio effects to specific video frames using a visually-referenced editing tool that also allows corrections to AV sync issues caused by equipment.

Popular Video Format Support NEW - Import a wide range of popular formats for recorded video, including MP4, M2TS, 3GP, AVI, MPEG-2 and now ultra high def 2K and 4K resolution video.

Apply Fast Fixes to Audio Problems

Professional-Grade Visual Repair - Removing audio imperfections in sound recordings is made easy with AudioDirector's advanced visual restoration interface that accurately visualizes what your ears hear. Repair audio problems using a comprehensive set of technologies including restoration tools licensed from leading audio design houses.

5 Powerful Selection Tools - Extract portions of sound to repair by selecting a section of time, a frequency range, or by using the brush or magic wand tools to precisely isolate problem areas

Innovative Harmonic Extraction - Extract sounds across the same frequency band using the Harmonic Finder to clean up imperfections from harmonically oscillating sources such as whistles.

Remove Unwanted Noise NEW - Quickly clean up video tainted soundtracks by applying noise reduction. Advanced noise profiling and precise controls adjust reduction and gating levels for a clean, punchy result.

Enjoy Powerful Tools for Faster, Richer Editing

Visual Effect Timeline NEW - Audio editing doesnÃƒÂ¢Ã‚â‚¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t have to be difficult AudioDirector makes it easy with intuitive yet powerful controls. An innovative display presents effects on a layered timeline below the audio waveform so you can see all applied effects at a glance. AudioDirector contains 6 new effects to instantly enrich audio with fine & granular controls.

Dynamic Profile Change NEW - Instantly convert the sample rate, bit depth and number of channels of any audio file. Expand mono or stereo files to 5.1/7.1 channels by applying TrueTheater Surround technology.

VST Plugin Support - AudioDirector features a wide range of popular effects and also supports custom VST plugin effectsÃ¢â‚¬â€the industry standard for audio processing software.

Visual Keyframe Control - AudioDirector's intuitive controls let you quickly add and adjust keyframe positions to change an audio track's volume or pan between L-R channels over time.

Make Unique Tracks with Intuitive Recording & Mixing

Simultaneous Multitrack Recording - Record from multiple audio sources either individually or simultaneously. Maintain complete control over the final audio arrangement with the ability to deal with distinct tracks. AudioDirector supports an extensive range of S/PDIF and USB recording devices.

Convenient Track Control - Convenient control buttons on each individual audio trackÃ¢â‚¬â€up to 99 tracksÃ¢â‚¬â€for full control at your fingertips. Select a track icon, mute, record, add volume keyframes and more.

Seamless Track Transitions NEW - Smart Transitions are effective way to move from one piece of background music to another without a glaring break. Choose from tempo, DJ scratch, or smooth repeat transitions.

AudioClipper iPhone App FREE - Quickly record interesting sound clips on your mobile devices whenever you hear them, so you can expand your library of sound clips to use on your video projects.

Produce in Multi-Channel Surround Sound

Dynamic Surround Sound Panning NEW - Create sophisticated surround sound projects using dynamic panning technology on any existing mono or multichannel audio file. Use the new Surround Sound Panner for precise control over home theater speaker output, or create a 5.1/7.1 channel surround sound effect on any audio file with the virtual surround sound generator.

High Resolution Audio Soundtracks - Produce your audio files with support for up to 7.1 channel audio, bit rates up to 192kHz and 32-bit depth for clarity and fidelity superior to CDs.

Burn Audio projects to CD NEW - Easier storage and sharing of audio projects with the new Burn to CD capability. Burn in popular formats MP3, WMA, M4A, WAV and now new lossless FLAC.

Screen Resolution : 1024 X 768, 16-bit color or above

Memory : 2GB or above recommended
Sound Card : Windows-compatible sound card
Hard Disk Space : 1 GB of disk space for application and documentation
